name: 100 Doors Remix
description:
100 Doors Remix is a very beautiful puzzle game, the goal of the game is to open all the doors placed in the different rooms.
To open a door you must find some hidden objects and solve some different puzzles and riddles.
To open all the doors and to comlete the game you also need a complete utilization of your device features and sensors (accelerometer, microphone and more).

The 100 doors are spread over 5 different worlds:

- Classic doors;
- Nerd doors;
- Horror doors;
- Science fiction doors;
- Fantasy doors.

Are you ready to beat all the levels of the game ?
